member.name: M:Useful.Sqlite.Extensions.SQLiteDataReaderExtensions.GetTimeSpanFromString(System.Data.SQLite.SQLiteDataReader,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the value of the column, with the given number, as a string and parses it as a TimeSpan.
member.param: The that will read the data from the database.
The number of the column whose data to parse.
member.returns: A TimeSpan representation of the column value.

member.name: M:Useful.Sqlite.Extensions.SQLiteDataReaderExtensions.GetTimeSpanTicksFromLong(System.Data.SQLite.SQLiteDataReader,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a TimeSpan object with a number of ticks equal to the value of the column with the given number.
member.param: The that will read the data from the database.
The number of the column whose data to parse.
member.returns: A TimeSpan with the column value as the number of ticks.

member.name: M:Useful.Sqlite.Extensions.SQLiteDataReaderExtensions.GetDateTime(System.Data.SQLite.SQLiteDataReader,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Parses the value of the column, with the given number, as a DateTime using the provided format.
member.param: The that will read the data from the database.
The number of the column whose data to parse.
A format specifier that defines how the column's value will be parsed to a DateTime.
member.returns: A DateTime representation of the column value.

member.name: M:Useful.Sqlite.Extensions.SQLiteDataReaderExtensions.GetDateTime(System.Data.SQLite.SQLiteDataReader,System.Int32,System.String,System.IFormatProvider)
member.summary: Parses the value of the column, with the given number, as a DateTime using the provided format specifiers.
member.param: The that will read the data from the database.
The number of the column whose data to parse.
A format specifier that defines how the column's value will be parsed to a DateTime.
An object that supplies culture-specific format information about the column's value.
member.returns: A DateTime representation of the column value.

member.name: M:Useful.Sqlite.Extensions.SQLiteDataReaderExtensions.GetDateTimeNullable(System.Data.SQLite.SQLiteDataReader,System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks if the value of the given column number is null. If it is - returns null, otherwise parses it as a DateTime.
member.param: The that will read the data from the database.
The number of the column whose data to get.
member.returns: "null" if the column has no value or its value as a DateTime.

member.name: M:Useful.Sqlite.Extensions.SQLiteDataReaderExtensions.GetDateTimeNullable(System.Data.SQLite.SQLiteDataReader,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the value of the given column number is null. If it is - returns null, otherwise parses it as a DateTime using the provided format.
member.param: The that will read the data from the database.
The number of the column whose data to get.
A format specifier that defines how the column's value will be parsed to a DateTime.
member.returns: "null" if the column has no value or its value as a DateTime.

member.name: M:Useful.Sqlite.Extensions.SQLiteDataReaderExtensions.GetDateTimeNullable(System.Data.SQLite.SQLiteDataReader,System.Int32,System.String,System.IFormatProvider)
member.summary: Checks if the value of the given column number is null. If it is - returns null, otherwise parses it as a DateTime, using the provided date format and IFormatProvider.
member.param: The that will read the data from the database.
The number of the column whose data to get.
A format specifier that defines how the column's value will be parsed to a DateTime.
An object that supplies culture-specific format information about the column's value.
member.returns: "null" if the column has no value or its value as a DateTime.
